channel.title: Projects on Wael El Ferchichi

item.title: Value at Risk Shiny Application
item.description: Introduction I created this application as part of a school project which goal was to apply Finance courses with programming in order to produce a fluid understandable dashboard that provides information about the Tunisian stock market and calculate the Value at Risk (VaR), given a certain portfolio composed by the user, through mulitple methods. You are free to try creating a portfolio and browse the shinyapp at the top of this page if you wish to discover its features.
